scripts.compile: rm -rf ./release/ && tsc --project tsconfig.json --declaration --declarationMap --skipLibCheck --outDir ./release && truffle compile && mkdir -p release/build/contracts release/typings && cp -r build/contracts/. release/build/contracts && cp -r typings/. release/typings
scripts.start-ganache: mkdir -p _out && ganache-cli -p 7545 -i 5777 -a 100 -m  "vanish junk genuine web seminar cook absurd royal ability series taste method identify elevator liquid" > _out/ganache.log
